name: Apna Cashback
tag_list: apnacashback, cashback, deals, shopping, india, vouchers, coupons
overview:
Apnacashback.com gives to Indian shoppers the opportunity to earn cash while shopping for things they would anyhow buy.

Apnacashback.com allows users to shop almost any product or service, ranging from flight tickets, travel packages, gifts, dating, matrimonial, computers, software etc. from various partners and pay cash back to them.

Online Shoppers simply register free with ApnaCashback and start shopping! Apnacashback receives a percentage of the sale amount from their partners and they in return pass a part of it on to the consumers.

In this time of credit crunch, when most shoppers are looking to save money wherever they can.

Shoppers simply search for the best discounts, deals from various vendors, and buy from ApnaCashBack to get additional money back from their purchase.

Indians living abroad (NRI) can use this website to send gifts/flowers to their loved ones back home and in addition some cash to make it extra special!

To visit the ApnaCashBack website, visit http://www.apnacashback.com
